    public class FunctionConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Wristband function config.

      Flag of function : imperial units
      static int FLAG_STRENGTHEN_TEST
      Flag of function : strengthen test.
      static int FLAG_TEMPERATURE_UNITS
      Flag of function : temperature unit setting, disabled for Centigrade , enabled for Fahrenheit

      Flag of function : turn over the wrist to bright screen.

      • isFlagEnable

        public boolean isFlagEnable(int flag)
        Is flag of function enable.
        参数:
        flag - FLAG_TURN_WRIST_LIGHTING FLAG_STRENGTHEN_TEST FLAG_HOUR_STYLE_12 FLAG_IMPERIAL_UNITS FLAG_TEMPERATURE_UNITS
        返回:
        True for enable. False for disable.

      • setFlagEnable

        public void setFlagEnable(int flag,
                 boolean enable)
        Set flag of function enable.
        参数:
        flag - FLAG_TURN_WRIST_LIGHTING FLAG_STRENGTHEN_TEST FLAG_HOUR_STYLE_12 FLAG_IMPERIAL_UNITS FLAG_TEMPERATURE_UNITS
        enable - True for enable. False for disable.

        返回:
